Based on your preferences, I would recommend "The Guard" and "Valkyrie". 

"The Guard" is a thrilling action movie directed by Gary Fleder. It stars Chris Pine as the mild-mannered Captain Richard Caraway of the US Navy, who is partnered with Ryan Gosling's character, Detective Simon Breach, in an attempt to capture a rogue drug dealer named Leonardi Valenti. 

"Valkyrie" is a thrilling action movie directed by Michael Bay. It stars Tom Cruise as the mild-mannered Captain Richard Caraway of the US Navy, who is partnered with Patrick Stewart's character, General Sir Brian Sturrock, in an attempt to capture a rogue drug dealer named Leonardi Valenti. 

I hope you find these recommendations interesting and enjoyable.

Based on your preferences and interest in superhero films, I recommend "Super" (2010) directed by James Gunn.

Plot Summary: "Super" stars Christopher Mintz-Plasse as Joe Smith, Michael Righetti as Mark Thompson, and Zach Gilford as Patrick "Supershop" Lee. After witnessing his former classmate being beaten up by a gang of thugs led by Mark Thompson, Joe Smith decides to put an end to their reign of terror once and for all, but along the way he discovers that not only are Mark Thompson and his gang of thugs responsible for many innocent lives being taken away from them forever and ever, but also they have been spreading lies and misinformation about themselves and their group in order to manipulate and deceive people into thinking that what is actually true and reality, and nothing but truth, lies, and misinformation, is actually what is actually true and reality.

I would recommend "My Soul to Take" based on its plot of a serial killer returning to his hometown to stalk seven children who share the same birthday as the date he was allegedly put to rest. This movie has been praised for its suspenseful plot and well-developed characters.
Another recommendation I would give is "The Darkest Hour". Based on its plot, this movie follows six friends coming together to play "The Game" as a celebration of Nick' s birthday. After a few rounds of they get separated while following a black van. Three stop in an alley so that Nick can relieve. His friends are forced into the lost black van by two druges. The other car of friends are informed by the kidnappers that if they want to see them again they have to do exactly what they say. It is revealed that the kidnappers are a modern day Jack the Ripper duo, stalking the streets, picking up prostitutes whom they murder and mutilate. These killer/kidnappers alarmed for being followed, frame these guys.
